Translations.Text: em tahsebu enne ekserahum yesme`une ev ya`kilun. in hum illa kel'en`ami bel hum edallu sebila
elem tera ila rabbike keyfe medde-zzill. velev sae lece`alehu sakina. summe ce`alne-ssemse `aleyhi delila
vehuve-llezi ce`ale lekumu-lleyle libasev vennevme subatev vece`ale-nnehara nusura
vehuve-llezi ersele-rriyaha busram beyne yedey rahmetih. veenzelna mine-ssemai maen tahura
linuhyiye bihi beldetem meytev venuskiyehu mimma halakna en`amev veenasiyye kesira
velekad sarrafnahu beynehum liyezzekkeru. feeba ekseru-nnasi illa kufura
velev si'na lebe`asna fi kulli karyetin nezira
fela tuti`i-lkafirine vecahidhum bihi cihaden kebira
vehuve-llezi merace-lbahrayni haza `azbun furatuv vehaza milhun ucac. vece`ale beynehuma berzehav vehicram mahcura
vehuve-llezi haleka mine-lmai beseran fece`alehu nesebev vesihra. vekane rabbuke kadira
veya`budune min duni-llahi ma la yenfe`uhum vela yedurruhum. vekane-lkafiru `ala rabbihi zahira
